ruleset.name: Apex Code Style Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex code style and formatting

rule.name: PreferStringJoinOverMultipleNewlines
rule.message: Strings with multiple newline characters should be replaced with String.join(strings, '\n')
rule.description:
String literals containing more than one newline character ('
') should be split into separate strings and joined using String.join() for better readability and maintainability.
Instead of: 'line1
line2
line3' Use: String.join(new List<String>{'line1', 'line2', 'line3'}, '
');
